defaultMessage: Selecting your identity icon and specifying the password
Attach an externally managed account via QR code
Import accounts from the Geth keystore with the original password
Import an industry-standard JSON keyfile with the original password
Enter a previously created raw private key with a new password
Import an Ethereum presale wallet file with the original password

Please select the type of account you want to create. Either create an account via name & password, or import it from a variety of existing sources. From here the wizard will guide you through the process of completing your account creation.
